cwn_entry.cwn_title: first release of dolog: the dumb ocaml logger
cwn_entry.cwn_what:
After an 'opam update', you should be able to see the dolog package.
Here is its minimalistic interface definition: --- type log_level = FATAL | ERROR | WARN | INFO | DEBUG
val set_log_level : log_level -> unit val set_output : out_channel -> unit
val fatal : string Lazy.t -> unit val error : string Lazy.t -> unit val warn : string Lazy.t -> unit val info : string Lazy.t -> unit val debug : string Lazy.t -> unit ---
The full source code can be found here:
https://github.com/HappyCrow/dolog
The license is a BSD one.
I believe the more complete logging alternative is Xavier Clerc's Bolt (<http://bolt.x9c.fr/>).
